title: Gender Bent Loli Is Not Cute! - Novel Updates
genre: Gender Bender   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life   Tragedy
tags: Age Regression   Alternate World   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Dense Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Loli   Male to Female
author: 奏奏奏酱
description:
In a night full of shooting stars, I made a wish. I wished that I could at least be in a relationship once——when I woke up, I became a girl with a body of a 12 year old.

「Clearly I wanted to do it with a loli, why did I end up becoming one!!」>
